about.title: About Me
about.text: I'm a web developer who loves when things work perfectly and look even better. I'm passionate about building websites that combine logic, creativity, and a focus on modern web design. Using technologies like Next.js, React, and Node.js, I create fast, reliable, and modern digital solutions. Every project is a challenge I take from concept to hosting and deployment, because true custom web development starts with understanding the details that make the difference.
